name: Image & Form
detail: Image & Form Games is a Swedish video game developer and publisher, founded in 1997 by Brjánn Sigurgeirsson. The company operates from Gothenburg, Sweden. The studio started out developing Windows- and Mac-based edutainment games for Scandinavian publishers.
